response.overview: A personal reflection on living alongside hallucinations, brought to life through experimental puppetry and doll-making. The film follows an individual visited by a number of mysterious figures, causing isolation and alienation within their own home. This film is informed by the director's lived experience of sensory disturbances, and created in conversation with the Change Mental Health Hearing Voices Service, which offers support in Tayside and Fife.
response.title: The Figure in the Carpet
